ticket.title: starttls for smtp makes gmail go
ticket.original-body:
Gmail's SMTP server requires STARTTLS to be enabled. The action_mailer_lib plugin patches Net::SMTP to enable STARTTLS. As of Ruby 1.8.7, Net::SMTP has this support built-in.
This patch calls Net::SMTP#enable_starttls_auto if available. When ActionMailer connects to an SMTP server that supports STARTTLS, it will use it.
